desc: Dotti Potts is a contemporary & modern design studio based in Barrie Canada. We are your go to for handmade porcelain mugs, ceramic jewelry, dinnerware & unique gifts.

layout.text:
Welcome to Dotti Potts.
HOURS:
We are open by chance or appointment. Please call ahead to make a time to meet. I am in the studio most week days from about 9am-5pm.
324 Saunders Road, Unit 4
Barrie, Ontario, Canada
Tel. 705 812 3306
